text: "I Started a Joke" is a 1968 song by Bee Gees and taken from their fifth studio album Idea. It was not released as a single in the United Kingdom but topped the charts in Australia, Brazil, Canada and New Zealand and went to number 6 in the United States. It was covered by Faith No More in 1998. ==Faith No More version== Faith No More released a cover version of the single in 1998 and taken from their greatest hits album Who Cares a Lot?. It went to number 38 in New Zealand. == References == Category:1968 songs Category:Bee Gees songs Category:Faith No More songs Category:Robbie Williams songs
title: I Started a Joke
